name: Dungeon Speedrunner
description: A game made for the GameMaker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019.  This is the first game i finished. The theme was "only one" so what i thought was that the player would be able to run only in one direction. Even though the game is a bit short, I think there is plenty of room for further development, so this is a concept I will be looking on in the future. I will appreciate any feedback.
